shadow.name: DISHONOR
shadow.description: Performing emotions, social manipulation through mood
shadow.behavioral_signature: Emotional displays for effect, strategic vulnerability
shadow.somatic_signature: Performed emotion, disconnected from genuine feeling
shadow.thought_pattern: If I show this emotion, they'll respond how I want.
shadow.emotional_state: Shame about authentic feelings, emotional dishonesty

gift.name: GRACIOUSNESS
gift.description: Authentic emotional expression that invites others in
gift.thought_pattern: I'll share what's true. How they respond is not my business.

siddhi.name: GRACE
siddhi.description: Emotions as divine poetry, beauty in all feeling
siddhi.behavioral_signature: Emotional artistry, transforming pain into beauty
siddhi.somatic_signature: Fluid emotional expression, no resistance to any feeling
siddhi.thought_pattern: Every emotion is sacred. All feeling is grace.
siddhi.emotional_state: Emotional mastery, beauty in all states

inversion_protocols.script: You are performing your emotions because you don't trust your authentic feelings are acceptable. Gate 22 is about genuine emotional expression that creates openness. When you perform, you prevent real connection. Others feel the performance. Share what's actually true.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Ask yourself: 'What am I really feeling beneath the performance?' Feel the genuine emotion.

experiment.hypothesis: If I share genuine emotions without performing, deeper connections will form.
experiment.action: For 5 days, share only genuine emotions. Stop curating your mood for effect.

success_criteria.target: Feeling more genuinely met by others
